transferFrom.description: Transfers `_value` tokens from the address `_from` to the address `_to`.

approve.description: Allows `_spender` to withdraw `_value` tokens from the sender's account.

approveAndCall.description: Allows `_spender` to withdraw `_value` tokens and executes a function call.

fields._extraData: Additional data for the function call

burn.description: Burns `_value` tokens from the sender's account.

burnFrom.description: Burns `_value` tokens from the account of `_from`.

fields._from: Address of the account to burn tokens from

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used by the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of the token.

balanceOf.description: Returns the token balance of the address `_address`.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that `_spender` is allowed to withdraw from `_owner`.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the given implementation address.

fields.from: Address of the account from which tokens were burned
